synopsis.text: Mion, a mysterious girl, disrupts the mundane life of high school student and gaming enthusiast, Akira Shiroyanagi, by thrusting him into a world of unique abilities and high-stakes battles. Akira, along with others, finds themselves erased from all official records and chosen as test subjects for a clandestine organization. Armed with newfound powers, Akira vows to ascend through the ranks and dismantle the organization from within. As this new generation engages in a battle of extraordinary abilities, Akira's love for games and determination to create change propels him forward in this dangerous, yet thrilling, new reality.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
